snippet: Alex Ovechkin won the head-to-head matchup between the N.H.L.’s two leading goal scorers, leading the Washington Capitals to a win over the St. Louis Blues.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals beat St Louis Blues, 4-1, as Capitals winger Alex Ovechkin scores his 16th and 17th goals of season, tying Alexander Steen for first place in league; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin won the head-to-head matchup between the N.H.L.’s two leading goal scorers, leading the Washington Capitals to a win over the St. Louis Blues.

headline.main: Scorers’ Duel Ends in Favor of Ovechkin
headline.print_headline: Scorers’ Duel Ends in Favor Of Ovechkin
